trans-unit.source: Represents a layout control that aligns a bullet and another visual object.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un controllo layout che consente di allineare un punto elenco e un altro oggetto visivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> has two content properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> ha due proprietà di contenuto: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to use as a bullet.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> proprietà definisce il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> da utilizzare come punto elenco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property defines a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that visually aligns with the bullet.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> proprietà definisce un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> che viene allineato visivamente con il punto elenco.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> always aligns with the first line of text when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> viene sempre allineato con la prima riga di testo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> oggetto è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is not a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> aligns to the center of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> oggetto non è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> Allinea al centro del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, see [How to: Create a BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul layout di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, vedere [procedura: creare un BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controls.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente vengono illustrati esempi di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controlli.

trans-unit.source: ![3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")
trans-unit.target: ![3 BulletDecorator: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorator: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: Negli esempi seguenti viene illustrano come definire un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The available <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> to use to lay out the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> disponibile da utilizzare per definire il layout del contenuto del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default content arrangement behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override del comportamento di disposizione predefinita del contenuto per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The computed size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni calcolate del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.ArrangeOverride%2A> method determines the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.ArrangeOverride%2A> metodo determina le dimensioni e la posizione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is aligned vertically with the first line of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> allineamento verticale con la prima riga del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore di sfondo del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The background color for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.
trans-unit.target: Il colore di sfondo per il <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child" /> di un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to use to fill the area within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> proprietà definisce il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> da utilizzare per riempire l'area all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.

trans-unit.source: For some parent layout elements, the area that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> may extend beyond its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: Per alcuni elementi di layout padre, l'area definita per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> può estendersi oltre il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> is the single child of a cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> property applies to the whole cell.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> è il singolo elemento figlio di una cella in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> (controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> proprietà si applica all'intera cella.

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cell is stretched in all directions to fill the cell, by default.
trans-unit.target: Questo errore si verifica perché il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cella si estende in tutte le direzioni per riempire la cella, per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> property only affects the actual content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center> per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> proprietà influisce solo sull'area del contenuto effettivo del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enclose the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile includere il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: Negli esempi seguenti viene illustrano come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the bullet in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l’oggetto da utilizzare come punto elenco nel <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> to use as the bullet.
trans-unit.target: L’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> da utilizzare come punto elenco.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property is a content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control and defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to display as a bullet for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> proprietà è una proprietà di contenuto il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controllare e definisce il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> da visualizzare come punto elenco per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The bullet that is defined by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is the first visual element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: Il punto elenco definito impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> è il primo elemento visivo in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is the second visual element.
trans-unit.target: Il singolo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> elemento è il secondo elemento visivo.

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo della sintassi XAML per elementi proprietà

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Negli esempi seguenti viene illustrano come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The specified index for the child element.
trans-unit.target: Ll'indice specificato per l’elemento figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento figlio in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento figlio <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The visual child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi visivi figlio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> sono il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è maggiore o uguale a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore per gli elementi figlio logici del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator that provides access to the logical child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: L’enumeratore che fornisce l’accesso agli elementi figlio logici del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The logical child elements for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control include the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio logici per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> controllo includono il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you set both properties, they are enumerated in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si impostano entrambe le proprietà, vengono enumerate nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi figlio visivi è lo stesso numero di elementi figlio logici.

trans-unit.source: The upper <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> limit of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.
trans-unit.target: Limite superiore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default measurement behavior for the objects of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override del comportamento di misurazione predefinita per gli oggetti di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The required <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control, based on the size of its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> obbligatorio per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />, basato sulla dimensione degli oggetti <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Visualizza il contenuto di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that is sized for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> content.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un <xref:System.Windows.Rect> struttura ridimensionata per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: This rectangular structure is displayed with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> color and no border.
trans-unit.target: Questa struttura rettangolare è visualizzata con l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> colore e nessun bordo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di elementi figlio visivi del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual elements that are defined for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi figlio visivi che sono definiti per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> can be 0, 1, or 2.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> può essere 0, 1 o 2.

trans-unit.source: If either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is defined, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> is 1.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> è definito l'elemento, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> è 1.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element are defined, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> is 2.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> e un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> vengono definite, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.VisualChildrenCount%2A> è 2.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi figlio visivi è lo stesso numero di elementi figlio logici.
